content.rendered:
LionsBet is the latest vogue in Nigeria for all sport lovers and punters. They offer the largest selection of online virtual games, and sports betting pre and live matches. The profound sports betting website offers the best odds in Nigeria with no hidden fees or commissions on deposits and withdrawals.

Talking about fast payout of wins including weekends, Lionsbet got you covered.  You don’t have to worry about stalled payout anymore. They also offer a wide range of Bonuses, weekly promotions and loyalty rewards to their customer.

For new customers, Lionsbet has a lucrative package of 100% bonus on first deposit up to N30, 000, isn’t that great? Wait there is still more; Lionsbet accumulator bonus points start from 3 games up to N5million in total bonus.

The website is simple to use, safe & secure and backed by a team of sports betting experts with the aim of delivering the best online sports betting experience to their customers.

Lionsbet covers all major sports and a vast number of betting types. Each month you can enjoy thousands of live betting events, and every bet offered on the website are also available on mobile as well.

Lionsbet is out to shake up the online betting industry with a new campaign that will see football punters win lip smacking prizes. If you are a console game lover, you really need to jump on this promo right away. Play any game on lionsbet.com with at least N500 and stand a chance to win PlayStation 4, Mobile Phones, Lionsbet account credit of N50, 000 (N5, 000 for 10 lucky winners), Lionsbet branded T-Shirts to the lucky winners of this promo. The event start from 12th May to 30th May 2017. Raffle draw for lucky winners will be on 2nd of June via Lionsbet Facebook live.

How to Participate:

  • Must have a Lionsbet account
  • You must be over 18years.
  • Stake a bet of N500 and above at once.
  • Screenshot your betslip
  • Post on social media (Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram) with your Lionsbet ID and #LionsbetWin and Tag us.

Also follow Lionsbet on social media to win weekly giveaways.
Facebook: Lionsbet
Twitter: Lionsbetting
Instagram: Lionsbetting
For more info or request call:

Email:support@lionsbet.com
Tel: +234 809 4444 035, +234 809 4444 036
